channel.title: Tandy Zoomer on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Tandy Zoomer on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Back To The Shack
item.description: Today in Tedium: For many reasons, largely related to a shifting business model incompatible with modern tech needs, a whole generation of people saw RadioShack as less a store for tinkerers and more a place to buy commodity tech products. It was a business model that fell out of sync with the enthusiast community that once championed its products, and the twice-bankrupt RadioShack has been paying the price for that pivot ever since.
